Class PlayViewController

java.lang.Object

PlayViewController class related to "play.fxml".
Author:
David García Solórzano

      private boolean died
      It indicates if the ball fell out of the stage and as a consequence the player died (s/he lost one life).

    • timeline

      javafx.animation.Timeline timeline
      It is a thread that executes the game cycle each 10 milliseconds.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayViewController

      public PlayViewController()

  • Method Details

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String msg)
      It stops teh game and shows the msg in a Label in the middle of the canvas.
      Parameters:
      msg - Text to display.

    • hideAlert

      private void hideAlert()
      It hides the alert and replays the game.

    • initialize

      private void initialize() throws IOException, LevelException
      Initializes the controller class. This method is automatically called after the fxml file has been loaded.
      Throws:
      IOException - When there is a problem while loading the game.
      LevelException - When there is a problem while loading a new level.

    • startLevel

      private void startLevel() throws LevelException
      It starts a new level if it exists. Otherwise, it stops the game and goes to the "gameover" scene.
      Throws:
      LevelException - When there is a problem while loading the new level.

    • go2GameOver

      private void go2GameOver()
      It stops the timeline, collects data related to the score and the number of the current level, and it finally goes to "gameover" scene.

    • paintInitCanvas

      private void paintInitCanvas()
      It paints the initial status of the current level o canvas.

    • paintInitBall

      private void paintInitBall()
      It paints the initial status of the current level's ball on the canvas.

    • paintInitPaddle

      private void paintInitPaddle()
      It paints the initial status of the current level's paddle on the canvas.

    • paintInitBricks

      public void paintInitBricks()
      It paints the initial status of the current level's brick on the canvas.

    • updateCanvas

      private void updateCanvas()
      It updates the bricks, ball, score and lives on the canvas.

    • updateBricks

      private void updateBricks()
      It updates by painting the bricks on the canvas.

    • updateBall

      private void updateBall()
      It updates by painting the ball on the canvas.

    • updateScore

      private void updateScore()
      It updates the UI component related to score.

    • updateLives

      private void updateLives()
      It updates the UI component related to lives.

    • movePaddle

      public void movePaddle(XDirection direction)
      It moves the paddle in the direction indicated by parameters.
      Parameters:
      direction - Direction in which the paddle must be moved.

    • backMain

      public void backMain()
      It goes to the "main" scene.
